title: Biden/Kimmel = Frost/Nixon, DALL-E Makes Apocalypse Fun 06.10.22
itunes:title: Biden/Kimmel = Frost/Nixon, DALL-E Makes Apocalypse Fun 06.10.22
description:
In episode 1266, Jack and Miles are joined by co-host of UpWorthy Weekly, Tod Perry, to discuss… Biden on Kimmel Says “Biracial Couples on TV Ads” Prove America Is On The Right Path, That Viral A.I. Art Program Has Some Major Problems and more!

  1. Biden on Kimmel Says “Biracial Couples on TV Ads” Prove America Is On The Right Path
  2. That Viral A.I. Art Program Has Some Major Problems
  3. TechScape: This cutting edge AI creates art on demand – why is it so contentious?
  4. Meet DALL-E, the A.I. That Draws Anything at Your Command
  5. The AI That Draws What You Type Is Very Racist, Shocking No One

LISTEN: Accadde a Harlem by Arawak

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
